title: KERNing in VOLT, problem.
content:
Hi, there!

I have a problem with kerning using VOLT.  
I completed kern settings in VOLT and it works, but only in VOLT. When I ship the font it recognize only kerning between numbers, but not between numbers and some letters (isolated letters eg.).

How do you solve this problem if you have it?

A.
author: Aleksandra2206

comments.content: The Arabic language is written in right to left direction while numbers are written from left to right. So there is no way to do kerning between Digits and Arabic letters. Kerning only works when the direction of flow is same for both members of the kerning pair.

I tried in diffrent ways to solve this problem and I failed. I tought it was possible to solve unpossible.

Thanks a lot :)

A.
